attributes.action: Ban on Financial Lenders (Banks etc) from selling Insurance products.
attributes.additional_details:
The people demand that legislation be introduced within one year that bans all banks, building societies, and other financial lenders (Post Office, etc) from owning, or having ANY relationship in any way with companies that sell any and all types of insurance such as PPI, Life Insurance, Life Assurance, Endowments, motor insurance, etc.
Further, such lenders are also banned from advising or making any reference to or on behalf of, and/or promoting, any business that sells such products.
